availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, attorney. Leverett, Franklin County, Massachusetts, native. Son of Charles Lee and Sarah Hobart Lee. Married to Caroline Dudley Lee in 1843. Father of Aurora Lee and Charles H. Lee. Married to Martha S. Thomas Lee in Bracken County on January 3, 1853. Married to Julia Ball Lee in Leverett, Massachusetts on November 21, 1859. Father of George Dudley Lee and Fannie S. Lee. Attended Chester Academy. Attended Uxbridge Academy in Worcester County, Massachusetts. Teacher in New Jersey in 1841. Teacher in Mason County, Kentucky, from 1841 to 1845. Surveyor in Bracken County. Admitted to the bar in 1853. County Judge of Bracken County. Attorney in Pendleton County, Kentucky, in 1865.

ab.bibl:
